alert.note: Alert for Central Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 10 at 9:32PM PDT until April 11 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 11 PM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Valley snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. 7 to 14 inches expected above 2500 feet. Heavy snow with rates 1-2" per hour will be possible Monday morning for Blewett Pass. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Plain and Leavenworth. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery roads conditions across US 2. Winter travel conditions will be possible across Blewett Pass.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
